s: Summary: Invitation‑only latency‑focused trading stack showcase co‑hosted by Avelacom, AWS, Copper, Elwood and Kraken.
Topics: ultra‑low‑latency connectivity, custodial APIs, portfolio orchestration, co‑location, market microstructure.
Speakers: senior engineers from each host, HFT strategy leads, infrastructure architects.
r: Benchmark your execution latency against industry best‑in‑class stack.
Secure privileged access to proprietary AWS networking solutions.
Build relationships with custodial and exchange partners for future integration.
